name: GuesstheAnswer
0:
”Alexa, open Guess the Answer”
”Alexa, start Guess the Answer”
”Alexa, launch Guess the Answer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the answer
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is a game in which you will have to guess the correct answer. For each question three answers will be proposed and only one will be correct. You will need to indicate the correct one by saying first, second or third. For each correct answer you accumulate a point and at the end of the game you will be told your score.
